content.raw:
Version ```9.5.0```, FreeBSD 11.2 amd64. Just build and run, and it would crash because of uninitialized objects, which is a well known C++ problem. In C++, static objects can never be used from static constructors.

The very fact that you do use them before ```main``` leads to this bug. Please fix it.
